name: Fleet Commander
description: A strategic mastermind who commands the Collective's space forces. The Fleet Commander excels at supporting allies and calling down devastating orbital strikes, turning the battlefield into a coordinated killing ground.

abilities.name: Carrier Strike
abilities.description: Calls down interceptors from an orbiting Carrier to strafe a target area, dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Shield Battery
abilities.description: Deploys a shield battery that restores shields to nearby allied units over time.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Instantly teleports the Fleet Commander and nearby allies to a target allied Nexus or Pylon.

abilities.name: Mass Recall
abilities.description: Teleports ALL friendly units on the map to the Fleet Commander's location.
